content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "375 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "190 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Grease a muffin pan or line with paper muffin liners.
2) In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar together until fluffy.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "cream"@27:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "butter"@33:39 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large mixing bowl"@6:25 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "brown sugar"@44:55 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until fluffy"@65:77 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Add bananas, milk, vanilla and eggs; mix well.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "bananas"@7:14 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "milk"@16:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "vanilla"@22:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "eggs"@34:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "mix"@40:43 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Stir in flour, bran, baking powder, soda and salt; blend just until moistened.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "flour"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "bran"@18:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "baking powder"@24:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "soda"@39:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "salt"@48:52 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "blend"@54:59 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until moistened"@65:80 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Pour batter into prepared muffin cups.
7) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "375 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-7-1 "190 degrees C"@26:39 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "20 to 25 minutes"@45:61 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean"@65:135 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Cool in the cups for 5 minutes, then remove muffins and place on a wire rack to cool completely.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Cool"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "5 minutes"@24:33 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "the cups"@11:19 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-8-1 "remove"@40:46 / AC
		:ppt ( "muffins"@47:54 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-8-2 "place"@59:64 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-8-1 "a wire rack"@68:79 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-8-0 "to cool completely"@80:98 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
